"I'm sorry to hear that," says the cheff.

There is an awkward pause before they speak again.

"Well, feel free to come back and try the soup."

The man seems offended, but simply smiles. You and Rah leave the stand, and give yourselves a decent amount of distance from that strange purple suited man.

"Should we go back to watch the boats? Or maybe we should just go home."Rah asks. "It might be best to just try to avoid these people."

Avoid these people and go homeGo back and watch the boats
